Flying, menace, first strike
When The Absolute, Chained enters, put a tadpole counter on up to three other target creatures. Then gain control of all creatures with tadpole counters on them until end of turn. They gain haste until end of turn.
Whenever another nontoken illithid dies, return it to the battlefield face down under your control. It’s a 2/2 black Horror creature.
{X}{U}{B}{R}, {T}, Pay X life: Put a tadpole counter on each of up to X target creatures.
